comment: Hey witches, you're all living on borrowed time. The only hex that's gonna happen is libs like you havin' your carcasses put on a stake.
amr:
# ::snt Hey witches, you're all living on borrowed time. The only hex that's gonna happen is libs like you havin' your carcasses put on a stake.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (l / live-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                              :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                    :mod (w / witch))
                              :ARG3 (a / all)))
                  :ARG1 (t / time
                        :ARG1-of (b / borrow-01)))
            :ARG2 p2
            :mod (h / hey
                  :mode expressive))
      :snt2 (h2 / hex-01
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :ARG1-of (l2 / liberal-02)
                  :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (y / you
                              :ARG0-of (h3 / have-03
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / put-01
                                          :ARG1 (c / carcass
                                                :poss y)
                                          :ARG2 (s2 / stake))))))
            :mod (o / only)))

# ::snt Where are the Christians?????
(p / person
      :mod (r / religious-group
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Christian"))
      :location (a / amr-unknown))

comment: Use of the slur here is unacceptable in discourse as it demeans and insults women.
amr:

comment: Please refrain from using derogatory terms for homosexuals.
